channel.title: CVE Feed for Rapid7 -- Nexpose/InsightVM Security Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rapid7 -- Nexpose/InsightVM Security Console

item.title: CVE-2019-5630|2024-08-04T20:01:51.880Z -- rapid7 -- nexpose%2Finsightvm%20security%20console
item.description: A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability was found in Rapid7 Nexpose InsightVM Security Console versions 6.5.0 through 6.5.68. This issue allows attackers to exploit CSRF vulnerabilities on API endpoints using Flash to circumvent a cross-domain pre-flight OPTIONS request.
